name: Journey Through "The Da Vinci Code" Part 1 Quiz | Literature | 10 Questions

questions.text: What was the name of the European secret society that made Sophie's grandfather a member?
questions.explanation:
Priory of Sion.

	Priory of Sion is a real organization that was created in 1099. Some of the greatest names in history were apart of the society such as Newton, Botticelli, Hugo, and Da Vinci.

questions.text: Sophie's grandfather, Jacques Sauniere, was a curator at the Louvre.
questions.explanation:
True.

	While he was dying, he wrote a message for Sophie telling her to contact Robert Langdon.

questions.text: Where was Robert staying while in Paris?
questions.explanation:
Ritz.

	Robert was the professor of religious symbology at Harvard. He was in Paris giving a lecture.

questions.text: What was the nickname Jacques had for Sophie?
questions.explanation:
Princess Sophie.

	Jacque had left the initials P.S. in the note he left for Sophie and no one else knew that P.S. stood for Princess Sophie but Sophie.

questions.text: What was the name of the man who killed Sophie's grandfather?
questions.explanation:
Silas.

	Silas killed all the remaining members of the brotherhood after they wouldn't give the location of the Grail.

questions.text: On what painting did Jacques leave another message for Sophie?
questions.explanation:
"The Mona Lisa".

	The message on the "The Mona Lisa" was an anagram for another painting called "Madonna Of The Rocks". When Sophie looked behind that painting, she found a key.

questions.text: What did Sophie and Robert find in Jacques' safety deposit box?
questions.explanation:
Cryptex.

	Leonardo da Vinci invented the cryptex which is a cylindrical tube that uses a code to get into it. The cryptex came inside a wooden box.

questions.text: What was the name of Jacques' friend at the bank?
questions.explanation:
Andre.

	Andre Vernet tried to steal the cryptex from Robert and Sophie because he thought they had killed Jacques.

questions.text: Who did Robert take Sophie to see so she could learn more about the Holy Grail?
questions.explanation:
Leigh Teabing.

	Leigh Teabing had been trying to find the Holy Grail for years. He was a rich man who had a butler named Remy. Robert and Sophie hid the cryptex under an divan in his house until they were ready to show it to him.

questions.text: What did Sophie learn the Holy Grail really was?
questions.explanation:
Mary Magdalene's body.

	Leigh told her that the Holy Grail was really Mary Magdalene's body and that Mary Magdalene and Jesus were a married couple who had children.
